title: Spring Stage
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Wooow~! The field is full of nanohana flowers~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, amazing, right? I thought it would be fun to have a picnic here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>You’re right! Hey, it’s a little early, but why don’t we have lunch now? You like bread, right, Emma-san? I made brioche sandwiches. Here, have some!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Waaah, they’re so cute! Thanks for the food... Hnn~, buono! The bread is a little sweet, but the salty stuffing makes me want to eat this forever~.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ehehe. Do eat a lot♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’m so full.... Now I’m getting sleepy....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, go ahead. Do you want to use my lap as a pillow?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>....No, I’m not sleeping! Such a beautiful place will go to waste if I spend it asleep. Kotori-chan, can I sing something to keep me awake?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ahaha, of course! It would be a treat to hear you sing on this nanohana flower field stage!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
